name: R.White and Eipper
description:
Description

  

  The journalist R.White and his colleague Mr.Eipper are intending to investigate a haunted town which was abandoned several years ago. This game is a platforming game, and a player needs to control two characters to reach the goal: find out more information about the story.

 

Controls

*"R" to restart

*"Enter" to continue the dialog

 

use R.White to investigate:

* Direction key: "left; right" to move

* "up" to jump

* touch the information icon to investigate

* "C" "ctrl" to use magic spells

 

use Eipper to shoot

* "A; D" to move

* "W" to jump

* "F" to shoot

* move faster and jump higher
